text: Solaris Center () is a shopping and entertainment complex in Tallinn, Estonia. It is the largest entertainment, trade and cultural center in Tallinn. The center was projected by Raivo Puusepp. The center was opened on March 2009. Net area of the center is 6,235 m². In the center, there is located 1800-place Nokia Concert Hall, also Cinamon Cinema Centre and Artis Art House is located there. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2009 establishments in Estonia Category:Buildings and structures in Tallinn Category:Shopping centres in Estonia Category:Shopping malls established in 2009 Category:Tourist attractions in Tallinn
title: Solaris Center, Estonia
